Description: Tiny doll's shirt of blue and white checked cotton. Body of a single piece of cloth, folded at the shoulder, hole cut for head. Sleeves each of one piece, folded along the top. Seams sewn in white cotton thread, no hemming.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), B76 B1-12 room 259 room 5 south wall (below)
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
